fields.name: Aggregation
fields.description: Dictionary of aggregation expression to use in the report. The key of each item in the dictionary is the alias for the aggregated column. Report can have up to 2 aggregation clauses.

fields.name: Configuration
fields.description: Has configuration information for the data in the report. The configuration will be ignored if aggregation and grouping are provided.

fields.name: Filter
fields.description: Has filter expression to use in the report.

fields.name: Granularity
fields.description: The granularity of rows in the report.

fields.name: Grouping
fields.description: Array of group by expression to use in the report. Report can have up to 2 group by clauses.

fields.name: Sorting
fields.description: Array of order by expression to use in the report.
